00067 void joNormalize::_validate(bool for_real)
00068 {
00069         copy_info();
00070         set_out_channels( Mask_All );
00071         Format temp = info_.format();
00072         width = temp.width();
00073         info_.set( info_.x(), info_.y(), info_.r(), info_.t() );

00081 void joNormalize::engine(int y, int x, int r, ChannelMask channels, Row& out)
00082 {
00084         out.range( 0, width );
00086         Row in1(x, r);
00087 
00088         input0().get(y, x, r, channels, in1);
00090         foreach (z, channels) 
00091         {
00093                 float* outPixelsR = out.writable(Chan_Red);
00094                 float* outPixelsG = out.writable(Chan_Green);
00095                 float* outPixelsB = out.writable(Chan_Blue);
00097                 for (int index = x; index < r; index++ ) 
00098                 {
00099                         Vector one( in1[Chan_Red][index], in1[Chan_Green][index],in1[Chan_Blue][index] );
00100                         
00101                         if ( one.length() > 0.0001 )
00102                         {
00103                                 Vector result = one;
00104 
00105                                 result.normalize();
00106 
00107                                 outPixelsR[index] = result.x;
00108                                 outPixelsG[index] = result.y;
00109                                 outPixelsB[index] = result.z;
00110 
00111                         } 
00112                         else
00113                         {
00114                                 outPixelsR[index] = 0.0f;
00115                                 outPixelsG[index] = 0.0f;
00116                                 outPixelsB[index] = 0.0f;
00117                         }
00118 
00119 
00120                         
00121                 }
00122                 
00123         }
00124 }
